definition: a unifying idea that is a recurrent element in literary or artistic work, provide with a particular theme or motive
details:
noun
- a unifying idea that is a recurrent element in literary or artistic work
= example: a unifying idea that is a recurrent element in literary or artistic work
= synonyms: motif
- (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed
= synonyms: stem
- an essay (especially one written as an assignment)
= synonyms: composition
- the subject matter of a conversation or discussion
= synonyms: subject
- (music) melodic subject of a musical composition
= example: (music) melodic subject of a musical composition
= synonyms: idea
verb
- provide with a particular theme or motive
= example: provide with a particular theme or motive
